verses.verse: For Zion <WH6726>'s sake will I not hold my peace <WH2814>, and for Jerusalem <WH3389>'s sake I will not rest <WH8252>, until her righteousness <WH6664> go forth <WH3318> as brightness <WH5051>, and her salvation <WH3444> as a lamp <WH3940> that burneth <WH1197>.

And the nations <WH1471> shall see <WH7200> thy righteousness <WH6664>, and all kings <WH4428> thy glory <WH3519>, and thou shalt be called <WH7121> by a new <WH2319> name <WH5344>, which the mouth <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068> shall name <WH8034>.
Thou shalt also be a crown <WH5850> of beauty <WH8597> in the hand <WH3027> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and a royal <WH4410> diadem <WH6797> in the hand <WH3709> of thy God <WH430>.

Thou shalt no more be termed <WH559> Forsaken <WH5800>; neither shall thy land <WH776> any more be termed <WH559> Desolate <WH8077>: but thou shalt be called <WH7121> Hephzi-bah <WH2657>, and thy land <WH776> Beulah <WH1166>; for Jehovah <WH3068> delighteth <WH2654> in thee <WH776>, and thy land shall be married <WH1166>.

For as a young man <WH970> marrieth <WH1166> a virgin <WH1330>, so shall thy sons <WH1121> marry <WH1166> thee <WH2860>; and as the bridegroom rejoiceth <WH4885> over the bride <WH3618>, so shall thy God <WH430> rejoice over thee <WH7797>.

I have set <WH6485> watchmen <WH8104> upon thy walls <WH2346>, O Jerusalem <WH3389>; they shall never <WH8548> hold their peace <WH2814> day <WH3117> nor night <WH3915>: ye that are Jehovah <WH3068>'s remembrancers <WH2142>, take ye no rest <WH1824>,
and give <WH5414> him no rest <WH1824>, till he establish <WH3559>, and till he make <WH7760> Jerusalem <WH3389> a praise <WH8416> in the earth <WH776>.

Jehovah <WH3068> hath sworn <WH7650> by his right hand <WH3225>, and by the arm <WH2220> of his strength <WH5797>, Surely I will <WH518> no more give <WH5414> thy grain <WH1715> to be food <WH3978> for thine enemies <WH341>; and foreigners5236, 1121 shall not drink <WH8354> thy new wine <WH8492>, for which thou hast labored <WH3021>:

but they that have garnered <WH622> it shall eat <WH398> it <WH1984>, and praise Jehovah <WH3068>; and they that have gathered <WH6908> it shall drink <WH8354> it in the courts <WH2691> of my sanctuary <WH6944>.

Go through <WH5674>, go through <WH5674> the gates <WH8179>; prepare <WH6437> ye the way <WH1870> of the people <WH5971>; cast up <WH5549>, cast up <WH5549> the highway <WH4546>; gather out <WH5619> the stones <WH68>; lift up <WH7311> an ensign <WH5251> for the peoples <WH5971>.

Behold <WH3068>, Jehovah hath proclaimed <WH8085> unto the end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>, Say <WH559> ye to the daughter <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726>, Behold <WH3468>, thy salvation cometh <WH935>; behold <WH7939>, his reward is with him <WH6468>, and his recompense before him <WH6440>.

And they shall call <WH7121> them The holy <WH6944> people <WH5971>, The redeemed <WH1350> of Jehovah <WH3068>: and thou shalt be called <WH7121> Sought out <WH1875>, A city <WH5892> not forsaken <WH5800>.
